quotes.main: The hardest choices require the strongest wills.
In their last moments, people show you who they really are.
You must become more than just a man in the mind of your opponent.
Peace was never an option.
No one cared who I was until I put on the mask.
Bury me in the ocean with my ancestors who jumped from ships, because they knew death was better than bondage.
Unfortunately for you, history will not see it that way.
Despite everything you've done for them, eventually they will hate you.
People need to believe, and nowadays, they'll believe anything.
People think in terms of good and evil when really, time is the true enemy of us all.
Everyone creates the thing they dread.
I have eaten more salt than you have had rice in your life.
You pretend to be a simple soldier, but in reality, you are just afraid to admit that we have left humanity behind.
If you are justice, please do not lie / What is the price for your blind eye?
The trouble with loyalty to a cause is that the cause will always betray you.
You either die a hero, or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
Let the past die. Kill it, if you have to.
The desire to become a superhuman cannot be separated from supremacist ideals.
If God is all-powerful, he cannot be all good. And if he is all good, then he cannot be all-powerful.
If you don't protect what belongs to you, then sooner or later it belongs to someone else.
A woman that can be bought isn't worth having.
A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused.
Cruelty is a gift humanity has given itself.
A dog who bites every owner he's had can only be disciplined with a firm hand or put down.
The worse part of having a mental illness is people expect you to behave as if you don't.
It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.
You know you're one bad day away from being me.
If you do not control your fate, it will control you.
When everyone's super, no one will be.
You have to be willing to do whatever it takes to seize your moment.
If you can make God bleed, people will cease to believe in him.
I'm not a bad person. Just had bad luck.
There is no good and evil. There is only power, and those too weak to seek it.
Intelligence is not a privilege, it's a gift. And you use it for the good of mankind.
We build the roads and we fight all their wars and everything. They don't care about us.
Everyone had to be drunk on something to keep pushing on. Everyone was a slave to something.
You win, you live. You lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win.
What was first just a dream has become a frightening reality for those who may oppose us.
It is an unfortunate evil, but speaks to a greater truth. One must destroy in order to create.
How you do anything is how you do everything.
Corruption like yours must be eradicated.
They don't give out awards for dying in the projects.
That which inspires us to our greatest good is also the cause of our greatest evil.
